StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateApplicant]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId uniqueiden..er, @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er = null, @SSN varchar(9), @FirstName varchar(50), @MiddleName varchar(15), @LastName varchar(50), @Su.x varchar(10), @Gender char(1), @Data image, @UserName varchar(50), @KeepLocked bit = 0 ) AS DECLARE @retVal int
DECLARE @ActualRecruiterId uniqueiden..er
IF (@RecruiterId IS NULL) BEGIN SET @ActualRecruiterId = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' END ELSE BEGIN SET @ActualRecruiterId = @RecruiterId END
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [AFP].[USMC].[Package] WHERE PersonId = @PersonId) BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [AFP].[USMC].[Package] WHERE PersonId = @PersonId AND LockedBy = @UserName) BEGIN UPDATE [AFP].[USMC].[Package] SET RecruiterId = @ActualRecruiterId ,SSN = @SSN ,FirstName = @FirstName ,MiddleName = @MiddleName ,LastName = @LastName ,Su.x = @Su.x ,Gender = @Gender ,UploadedBy = @UserName ,DateUploaded = GetDate() ,LockedBy = CASE @KeepLocked WHEN 1 THEN @UserName ELSE NULL END ,DateLocked = CASE @KeepLocked WHEN 1 THEN GetDate() ELSE NULL END ,Data = @Data WHERE PersonId = @PersonId
-- Record the update in the history table. INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[PackageHistory] ([PersonId], [Ac.on] ,[Actor] ,[Ac.onDate]) VALUES (@PersonId, 'Updated', @UserName, GetDate())
SET @retVal = 1 END ELSE BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [AFP].[USMC].[Package] WHERE PersonId = @PersonId AND LockedBy IS NOT NULL) SET @retVal = -1 ELSE SET @retVal = -2 END END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[Package] ([PersonId] ,[RecruiterId] ,[SSN] ,[FirstName] ,[MiddleName] ,[LastName] ,[Su.x] ,[Gender] ,[UploadedBy] ,[DateUploaded] ,[LockedBy] ,[DateLocked] ,[Data]) VALUES (@PersonId ,@ActualRecruiterId ,@SSN ,@FirstName ,@MiddleName ,@LastName ,@Su.x ,@Gender ,@UserName ,GetDate() ,CASE @KeepLocked WHEN 1 THEN @UserName ELSE NULL END ,CASE @KeepLocked WHEN 1 THEN GetDate() ELSE NULL END ,@Data)
-- Record the insert in the history table. INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[PackageHistory] ([PersonId], [Ac.on] ,[Actor] ,[Ac.onDate]) VALUES (@PersonId, 'Added', @UserName, GetDate())
SET @retVal = 0 END
SELECT @retVal
